tools.name: read_docs_by_list
tools.description: Read multiple documents (PDF, Word, HTML) using pandoc
args: for file in "$@"; do if [ -f "$file" ]; then echo "=== $file ==="; case "$file" in *.pdf) pdftotext -layout -nopgbrk "$file" - 2>/dev/null || echo "Error: Cannot read PDF (install pdftotext)";; *.html|*.htm) pandoc -f html -t plain "$file" --wrap=none 2>/dev/null || echo "Error reading $file";; *.doc|*.docx) pandoc -f docx -t plain "$file" --wrap=none 2>/dev/null || echo "Error reading $file";; *) echo "Unsupported file type";; esac; echo; else echo "=== $file ==="; echo "Error: File not found"; echo; fi; done

files.description: Array of document paths to read (supports .pdf, .doc, .docx, .html, .htm)
